title: The Rush Limbaugh Show Podcast
itunes:title: The Rush Limbaugh Show Podcast
description:
PODCAST SUMMARY HOUR 1:

Roberts sides with liberals again on abortion case, flip-flops from earlier position. People, not Rush, are asking what Democrats have on Justice Roberts. Pelosi out saying Putin is blackmailing Trump, why not say it about Roberts: Roberts hates Trump. CNN worried that ruling puts abortion back on the ballot, could help Trump. Trump talked up SCOTUS picks at Tulsa rally. You have to doubt the Russia-Taliban bounty story. Pelosi revives Putin blackmailing Trump narrative. Taliban story is fake news. If Biden is 12 points ahead in the polls why are they going back to the Russia hoax? WaPo blames conservative media for coronavirus deaths, claims Rush said Vitamin C can stop coronavirus. Michigan GOP House candidate praises his Millennial, college-aged daughter is campaigning against him, proving what Rush has been saying about Millennial women and their fathers.

PODCAST SUMMARY HOUR 2:

We're losing the country to multiculturalism. GOP candidate Robert Regan on his daughter campaigning against him. Conservative parents do not speak up against leftist indoctrination in schools. Leftist educators turning kids against their parents. 15-year-old Oregon conservative wants to know how to push back. White woke affluent Millennial women are running the Black Lives Matter movement, think blacks are helpless without them. Homeschool dad fears social workers will come into homes, call parents racist, take kids. Cultural revolutions use force, count on lack of pushback.

PODCAST SUMMARY HOUR 3:

WH press corps on NYT Russia-Taliban story. Charles Gasparino says GOP insiders talking about Trump not running for reelection. The only thing Biden has going for him is he's not Trump. Victor Davis Hanson on Trump's path to reelection. The anger of the ugly. Kayleigh McEnany pushes back on Russia story at WH press briefing, reporter asks if Trump wishes the South won the Civil War. Dems don't really believe Biden is way ahead.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

Follow Clay & Buck on YouTube: https://www.youtube.com/c/clayandbuck

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
